entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except temperature steady near minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning except temperature steady near minus 11 inland. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6 except minus 3 along the coast.
